snippet: Formula One has tried and tried again to find a permanent home for the United States Grand Prix. Finally, it has settled on what might seem like the weirdest place: Austin, Texas.
abstract: Formula One has tried and tried again to find a permanent home for the United States Grand Prix. Finally, it has settled on what might seem like the weirdest place: Austin, Texas.

headline.main: F1 Races Into America and Austin Keeps It Weird
